column5: Hey All,  Can anyone recommend a landscaper in the Whitby area? I'm looking at doing a stamped concrete patio in my backyard but what some quotes. No idea how much it will cost.  Thanks in advance  Cheers
Try TBG Landscape or APPCO paving. A couple of contractors that I use all the time
TBG is a good firm, having been in the trade for over 30 years, I am impressed with what they do. Another alternative is to go to Landscape ontario and search there.
